If your client is under an EA with Azure billing set up, and with servers are
able to be enrolled in Azure Arc, ESUs can be paid for monthly, allowing payment
only until you get upgraded without having to commit to a year or more. Quite
cost effective if you can get the enrollment coordinated. They will be billed
back to October to get started, so the first bill will be from then to now. 
How to get Extended Security Updates (ESU) for Windows Server 2008, 2008 R2,
2012, and 2012 R2 | Microsoft Learn

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Extended Security Updates for Server 2012R2
metadata.email_text_original:
If your client is under an EA with Azure billing set up, and with servers are
able to be enrolled in Azure Arc, ESUs can be paid for monthly, allowing payment
only until you get upgraded without having to commit to a year or more.  Quite
cost effective if you can get the enrollment coordinated.  They will be billed
back to October to get started, so the first bill will be from then to now. 
How to get Extended Security Updates (ESU) for Windows Server 2008, 2008 R2,
2012, and 2012 R2 | Microsoft Learn
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fwindows-server%2Fget-started%2Fextended-security-updates-deploy%23extended-security-updates-enabled-by-azure-arc&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7Ca6bad18aead040d4841b08dc268984cc%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638427619281911207%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=H8mr%2FSms5W8F6u6ZMGFOkI6Grte9aMY%2BjCDJ2ZhUiOI%3D&reserved=0] 
From: 'CR Hiestand' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Monday, February 5, 2024 10:52 AM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Extended Security Updates for Server 2012R2 
Yes, it’s a yearly purchase. The price goes up each year. 
Or put it on Azure Stack HCI and it’s included all 3 years.
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/65530fe34ffc4222a432d9bba03bac14%40davispolk.com
